Title: Provides no county shall supersede any state law which relates to the division of any county into districts for the purpose of apportionment
Summary: Provides that any plan of apportionment relating to the division of a county, except a county wholly contained within a city, into districts for the purpose of apportionment or reapportionment of members of its local legislative body shall be subject to federal and state constitutional requirements; further provides for standards to be followed for such plan.
LawCode: Amd ยง34, Munic Home R L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the municipal home rule law, in relation to the division of a county into districts for the apportionment of members of its local legislative body
